name: PIXELBlast
description:
PIXEL Blast is a simple yet addictive twin stick shooter. The goal is simple... destroy the evil pixels and get your name on to the high score table!

FEATURES

  • Online highscores - Can you get to the top?
  • Multiple offensive and defensive power ups - rockets, lasers, drones and many more!
  • Gamepad or mouse/keyboard support - choose the one that you like most!
  • Unique power up system - The higher the multiplier, the better the power up, but selecting a power up resets the multiplier!

CONTROLS

  • Keyboard/Mouse - WASD to move, mouse to aim, and RMB to use powerup. LMB in all menus to select.
  • GamePad - Right stick and "A" to navigate menus, Left stick to move, right stick to aim, Left/Right triggers to use powerup.
